problems.title: Find Maximum Element in Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers. Find and return the maximum element in the array.

If the array is empty, return null or handle the empty case appropriately.

Input Format
The first line contains integer N (size of array).
The second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print the maximum element.
If the array is empty, print "Array is Empty".

Example
Input:
5
10 5 8 20 3

Output:
20

Explanation:
The maximum element among 10, 5, 8, 20, 3 is 20.
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
10 5 8 20 3

Sample Output 1
20

Sample Input 2
3
100 200 150

Sample Output 2
200

Sample Input 3
1
42

Sample Output 3
42
hintsList: Iterate through the array and keep track of the maximum value seen so far.
Initialize max with the first element, then compare with remaining elements.
